title: Curriculum Vitae
text:
Experience

Policy Analyst (Intern)
OECD - Trade and Agriculture Directorate (TAD-ARP)
2023–2024

Conducted research and analysis on agricultural policies.
Contributed to reports on resource sustainability and trade trade.



Research Assistant
Swedish University of Agricultural Sciences (SLU)
2022–2023

Performed data cleaning and statistical analysis for the EU-Horizon project “Contracts2.0”.
Assisted in preparing datasets for economic modelling.
